description: Domain responsibilities must be reflected in stories

examples.content: Responsibility 'Agile Bot: Generates MCP Server' is reflected in Epic 'Manage Agile Bots'
Responsibility 'MCP Bot Server Generator: Generates MCP Bot Server' is reflected in Feature 'Generate MCP Bot Server And Tools'
Responsibility 'Project: Provides Project Scaffold' is reflected in Story 'Project Generates Project Scaffold'

examples.description: Domain responsibility reflected in story step
examples.content: Responsibility 'Agile Bot: Loads Workflow' is reflected in story step 'Agile Bot loads Workflow from Bot Config'

examples.description: Domain responsibility can be reflected in multiple story steps
examples.content: Responsibility 'Project: Manages Project State' is reflected in story steps 'Project checks project_area parameter', 'Project stores project_area and bot_name', 'Project validates project exists'

examples.description: Don't leave domain responsibilities without story reflection
examples.content: Responsibility 'Agile Bot: Loads Workflow' missing story step - Add 'Agile Bot loads Workflow from Bot Config' in story 'Initialize Bot For Project'

examples.description: Don't ignore domain responsibilities that need story steps
examples.content: Responsibility 'Bot Tool: Moves To Next Action If Done' missing story - Add story 'Bot Tool Determines Active Step To Invoke' with step 'Bot Tool moves Workflow to next action'
